NOTE: package.json (JSON) is automatically generated from package.cson (CSON)
name: EPUB3Sliderizer
description: EPUB3-Sliderizer, a tool to create dual ebook / web slideshow presentations
keywords: epub3 ebook e-book slideshow slidedeck slides

scripts.dev: npm run clean && echo > open_webbrowser.js && parallelshell "npm run live-reload" "npm run watch" "npm run http"
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
scripts.build:js: node build-tools/rjs.js ./rjs_config && hashmark -s -l 8 -m dist/assets.json dist/main.js "dist/{name}{hash}{ext}" && rimraf dist/main.js
scripts.build:css: stylus css/main.styl -m -o dist/ && hashmark -s -l 8 -m dist/assets.json dist/main.css "dist/{name}{hash}{ext}" && rimraf dist/main.css
scripts.build:html: jade html/index.jade --obj dist/assets.json -o dist && rimraf dist/assets.json
scripts.watch:build: watch "npm run build && node build-tools/webbrowser.js && npm run webbrowser && rimraf open_webbrowser.js" ./
